DOCUMENT ()
  BEGIN_REGION (>>>DOCUMENT)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  title (title:: Conditional )
    string (title:: Conditional )
  id (id:: td-000004)
    string (id:: td-000004)
  define (define:: version_1)
    string (define:: version_1)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  PARAGRAPH (This SML document co)
    string (This SML document co)
    sglquote_string (version_1)
      string (version_1)
    string ( is defined.  The se)
    sglquote_string (version_2)
      string (version_2)
    string ( is defined.)
  CONDITIONAL ()
    BEGIN_CONDITIONAL (???version_1)
    PARAGRAPH (VERSION 1 -- This is)
      string (VERSION 1)
      emdash_symbol ()
      string (This is a conditiona)
      sglquote_string (version_1)
        string (version_1)
      string ( is )
      dblquote_string (defined.)
        string (defined.)
    END_CONDITIONAL (???version_1)
  CONDITIONAL ()
    BEGIN_CONDITIONAL (???version_2)
    PARAGRAPH (VERSION 2 -- This is)
      string (VERSION 2)
      emdash_symbol ()
      string (This is a conditiona)
      sglquote_string (version_2)
        string (version_2)
      string ( is )
      dblquote_string (defined.)
        string (defined.)
    END_CONDITIONAL (???version_2)
  END_REGION (<<<DOCUMENT)
